What we did Working principles

Trigger - Insight #2

Prompts can influence behaviours

We believe...

Triggers can be used to overcome a lack of motivation and ability to an extent, we have some already that can have an impact.

Because we've seen and heard...

People in the business chasing people up for actions and responses

BPs contacting people for updates

"Assign action owners who will be chased automatically"

"(need) Flag actions and completions - what's outstanding"
